solution_line_template: A pie contains {slices_per_pie} slices so the pie shop makes {cost_per_slice}*{slices_per_pie}=$<<{slices_per_pie}*{cost_per_slice}={money_per_pie}>>{money_per_pie} for a pie.
If they sell {num_pies_sold} pies, they make {num_pies_sold}*{money_per_pie}=$<<{num_pies_sold}*{money_per_pie}={total_money_made}>>{total_money_made}
